archimate:Requirement.name: SC.2.2.2c: c) extending perimeter security into the cloud environment by leveraging the inbuilt firewalls supplied by CSPs, implementing virtual firewalls and/or deploying web application firewalls (WAFs).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
